## addToField() function

Increments <b>value</b> of <b>object</b>\[<b>field</b>\]. If <b>field</b> is undefined it is assigned to <b>value</b>.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function addToField(object: any, field: string, value: any): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  object | any |  |
|  field | string |  |
|  value | any |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

any
